Interface MouseSubscriber

All Known Implementing Classes:
Being, BeingTest.TestBeing, GenericGroup, GravityInteractorTest.TestBeing, Group, HCamera, MassedBeing
public interface MouseSubscriber

Must be implemented by any object that wants to listen for and receive Mouse messages
